name: Sleepy Sheepie AR
description:
Slee·py Shee·pie (n) An organism capable of converting caffeine into code.

Just an ordinary grass eater by day, but a genius programmer by night! If only there were enough cups of coffee to last the whole night!

Help Sleepy Sheepie to collect as many cups of coffee as possible while avoiding running into a fence or a pillow!

Play on your mobile device or in AR mode!

Simple and addictive gameplay! Tap to jump over the fence, tap to grab coffee!
Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends coffee high score?

Features:
- Simple controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Fun soundtrack
- Unlimited coffees to collect

How to play game:
- Tap to jump over the obstacle
- Tap to jump and collect coffee
- Gain points with each cup
- Conquer the leaderboard


FYI! Sleepy Sheepie is free to download and play, but, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 16 years of age to download or play Sleepy Sheepie.

A network connection is also required.

Privacy Policy: https://gbtigames.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: https://gbtigames.com/terms-of-service/
